snippet: In an unsavory confluence of social media and the arts, we now have the tweet seats — sections of otherwise dignified theaters where communicating via Twitter during shows is encouraged.
abstract: Peter Funt Loose Ends column comments on the fact that using Twitter during some theatrical and musical performances is being actively encouraged.
lead_paragraph: In an unsavory confluence of social media and the arts, we now have the tweet seats — sections of otherwise dignified theaters where communicating via Twitter during shows is encouraged.
